mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post (user_id, user_nickname, title, content, topic, tag) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userNickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{topic}, #{tag});
mapper.update: UPDATE community_post SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, topic=#{topic}, tag=#{tag} WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post WHERE user_id=#{userId};
